Set within an attractive terrace of early 19th century buildings is this charming duplex apartment.

Accommodation is formed of a well-proportioned ground floor reception room and separate fitted kitchen / breakfast room. There are two double bedrooms below, along with a modern family bathroom.

The property benefits from a two tiered private rear garden, complete with garden store.

Situation
Located around half a mile north of Hyde Park, Star Street is in one of the best connected areas of London. Nearby transport links include underground services from Brunel's Grade I Listed Paddington station (Circle, District, Bakerloo and Hammersmith and City, in addition to National Rail services and Heathrow Express). The widely anticipated CrossRail (Elizabeth Line) will connect London east to west with a major new hub at Paddington. Other convenient stations include Edgware Road, Marble Arch (Central Line) and Marylebone.

address: The Lancasters, Lancaster Gate, London W2
detailedDescription:
One of the few apartments within the development with its own private outside space and therefore very special indeed.

Location

The Lancasters is a recent development set behind a white stucco fronted Grade II Listed period facade that dates back to the mid 1850's and was once the largest terrace of its kind in Europe. It sits within its own gated landscaped grounds overlooking Hyde Park with a private driveway and is looked after by a 24 hour concierge and valet parking service. The residents also enjoy plenty of facilities including a fully fitted gym, swimming pool, sauna and lounge. Neighbouring both Mayfair and Notting Hill, Lancaster Gate is ideally located to enjoy some of the best shopping and restaurant amenities the capital has to offer. Furthermore, the convenient transport links at Lancaster Gate Underground Station (Central Line) allow excellent access to the City and West End whilst the Heathrow Express at Paddington Station is also a short taxi ride away.

Description

This particular apartment is presented in an excellent condition,
with underfloor heating and comfort cooling throughout. The
formal reception faces south overlooking the gardens towards
the park and takes advantage of the period architecture which
allows superb 4.1m ceiling heights in the beautifully grand
reception room. There are also more informal living spaces by
way of the kitchen/dining room and second reception (currently
used as a more relaxed media/reading room) which both open
onto the private secluded paved terrace. The master bedroom
occupies the entire mezzanine floor and has a walk-through
dressing room with both a bath and shower room. There are
two guest double bedroom suites, a study, cloakroom and utility room. If required, the second reception room could also be used as a fourth bedroom as there is an additional bathroom off the study. The apartment comes with one designated underground parking space however, a further space is available by separate negotiation if required.

Square Footage: 2714 sq ft

address: Craven Hill Mews, Bayswater, London W2
detailedDescription:
This beautifully presented house situated in a very attractive, quiet cobbled mews has been designed to maximise the feeling of space and light and blends contemporary and traditional styles perfectly. The property is entered through a set of private double doors into the stunning reception room. The grand dual aspect reception room has a real wow factor, with its high ceilings, wood floors and arched windows. Just off the reception room is the stylish kitchen with ample workspace and a range of appliances.
On the lower ground floor are three bedrooms, all centred around a large hallway with utility room, family bathroom and a spacious storage room which we are informed has plumbing in situ for an additional shower room if desired.
The top floor comprises flexible space for a principle bedroom or second reception room. This room also features space for an office area, extensive storage, bathroom and access to a south-facing decked terrace overlooking the mews.

Craven Hill Mews is centrally located with excellent transport links such as Lancaster Gate underground (Central line) and Paddington mainline (Network Rail and Heathrow Express) and underground (District, Circle, Bakerloo and Hammersmith & City lines) station. Oxford Street and the West End are both easily accessible offering some of the best shops, restaurants and theatre London has to offer. Craven Hill Mews is also perfectly positioned for the imminent arrival of Crossrail which will offer faster journey times into the City and Canary Wharf.

detailedDescription:
Vincent Square provides the ideal Westminster location in the heart of London.

A spacious and contemporary Penthouse apartment located on the third and fourth floors (with lift) and a porter. The terrace has wonderful views overlooking Vincent Square and the property is being sold with the benefit of two secure underground car parking spaces a share of the freehold and a storage cage. The apartment is situated in what is widely regarded as one of Westminster’s premier developments.

The development is a conversion of the Listed former Rochester Row Police Station and Magistrates Court. Sensitively redesigned by John Simpson Architects, the conversion gives these historic buildings a new lease of life as residential homes.

The third floor has a modern and well equipped separate kitchen and breakfast room with Siemens and Gaggenau appliances which leads to a stunning living room with large glass framed doors out onto the terrace with far reaching views over Vincent Square. There is a powder room and third bedroom/study also located on this floor. Stairs lead to the fourth floor which is home to the principle bedroom suite with an abundance of fitted wardrobes, bedroom two and a family bathroom. The apartment has underfloor heating throughout.

The apartment building has a 24 hour concierge service. The secure storage cage included in the basement and extends to approx. 40 square feet providing excellent space for all your storage needs. The parking spaces are scheduled to be installed with electric charging points in June. Residents of the Vincent Square residents association gain access to the tennis courts when not in use by Westminster School.
Vincent Square is Westminster’s premier square, with the playing fields of Westminster School at its centre. A wide selection of amenities, shops, bars and restaurants can be found in nearby Pimlico as well as Victoria. St. James’s Park (District, Circle lines), Pimlico Station (Victoria Line) and Victoria Station (British Rail, Gatwick Express, District, Circle and Victoria lines) all offering excellent transport links.
